description:
Upon entering a strange cave, Krillin and Goku are confronted by enemies from their past. Can Krillin find the courage to defeat them, or is history destined to repeat itself?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Besiege deine Angstgegner! - Krillin findet seinen Kampfgeist wieder!
Defeat These Terrifying Enemies! Krillin`s Fighting Spirit Returns!
Derrote esses Inimigos Terríveis! O espírito de luta de Kuririn retorna!
Kyouteki o Uchiyabure! Krillin no Toushi Futatabi!
¡Derrótalos a todos! ¡El espíritu de lucha de Krilin ha vuelto!
強敵を打ち破れ! クリリンの闘志ふたたび!
